TITLE GOES HERE: Identify what years of data are available in the `flights` table of the `airlines` database.

```{r eval = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(mdsr)
library(RMySQL)
con <- dbConnect_scidb("airlines")
```

<!--begin-answer-->

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(mdsr)
library(RMySQL)
con <- dbConnect_scidb("airlines")
dbGetQuery(con, "SHOW TABLES")
flights <- tbl(con, "flights")
flights %>% 
  group_by(year) %>%
  summarize(n = n())
```

<!--end-answer-->
